report_data.Post or Account Link: Let’s stop pretending that Syria can ever return to being one country. Too much blood has been spilled, and the wounds between sects and ethnicities are too deep to heal. The Alawites can govern their coastal regions, the Kurds can keep their northeast, and the Sunnis can rebuild the heart of the country. Forced unity has only brought suffering. Real peace requires a formal division — federalism, or even separation, is the only rational solution now.

classification:
After analyzing the post, I classify it as:

Sectarian Incitement
